doc:
Beverley Cressman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beverley_Cressman 0 Beverley Cressman is a British actor, best known for being the first person cast as Kate Lethbridge-Stewart. She appeared in two unofficial direct-to-video Doctor Who spin-offs, Downtime (1995), and Dæmos Rising (2004). Beverley_Cressman is a_British_actor , best_known for being the_first_person cast as Kate_Lethbridge-Stewart . She appeared in two_unofficial_direct-to-video_Doctor Who_spin-offs , Downtime_(_1995_) , and Dæmos Rising (_2004_) .
